text: R4.6. Average Disk Access Time The average seek time for a disk is 15 ms. The disk rotates at 3600 RPM and there are 128 sectors per track. What is the average access time to read one sector, in ms? Give you answer to 2 decimal places. number (rtol=0.0001, atol=0.0051) (-] Save & Grade Single attempt Ad(ditional attempts available with new variants @
